pr_title: Database V6: store all in a single Rocks DB instance by default

timeline.message: Refactor DB Schema interfaces, add V6 database version
Name members and params more consistently in VersionedDatabaseFactory
Allow creating older DB versions (at least for testing)
Fit column IDs to one byte
In tests close DB on clean up

timeline.body: I think this might be a little simpler if we just use a boolean here - something like: `shouldDefaultToSeparateDbs`
timeline.bodyText: I think this might be a little simpler if we just use a boolean here - something like: shouldDefaultToSeparateDbs
timeline.bodyHTML: I think this might be a little simpler if we just use a boolean here - something like: shouldDefaultToSeparateDbs

replies.bodyText: See my comment below: the idea was to allow a completely different location for archive DB
replies.author: Nashatyrev

timeline.body:
We want all the dbs to be in the data directory:
```suggestion
    final String archiveDirPath =  shouldCreateSeparateDbs ? ARCHIVE_PATH : DB_PATH
    this.v6ArchiveDirectory = this.dataDirectory.toPath().resolve(archiveDirPath).toFile();
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
We want all the dbs to be in the data directory:

Suggested change
this.v6ArchiveDirectory =
maybeArchiveDataPath.map(p -> Paths.get(p).resolve(ARCHIVE_PATH).toFile());
final String archiveDirPath = shouldCreateSeparateDbs ? ARCHIVE_PATH : DB_PATH
this.v6ArchiveDirectory = this.dataDirectory.toPath().resolve(archiveDirPath).toFile();
timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.author: Nashatyrev

timeline.body:
Any existing metadata should override preferences wrt single / multiple dbs:
```suggestion
          v6ArchiveDirectory
          .filter(__ -> !metaData.isSingleDB())
          .map(dir ->
                  metaData
                      .getSeparateDbConfiguration()
                      .get()
                      .getArchiveDbConfiguration()
                      .withDatabaseDir(dir.toPath()));
```
timeline.bodyText:
Any existing metadata should override preferences wrt single / multiple dbs:
  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                      v6ArchiveDirectory.map(
          
          
            
                          dir ->

                                  .getSeparateDbConfiguration()

                                  .withDatabaseDir(dir.toPath()));

Any existing metadata should override preferences wrt single / multiple dbs:

Suggested change
v6ArchiveDirectory.map(
dir ->
metaData
.getSeparateDbConfiguration()
.get()
.getArchiveDbConfiguration()
.withDatabaseDir(dir.toPath()));
v6ArchiveDirectory
.filter(__ -> !metaData.isSingleDB())
.map(dir ->
metaData
.getSeparateDbConfiguration()
.get()
.getArchiveDbConfiguration()
.withDatabaseDir(dir.toPath()));
timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText:
We are throwing exception if there is a mismatch between existing metadata and presence/absence of v6ArchiveDirectory. So the suggested filter() condition would always be true.
https://github.com/PegaSysEng/teku/blob/d004e277b9949cf59e3a9e9394767d0566168477/storage/src/main/java/tech/pegasys/teku/storage/server/VersionedDatabaseFactory.java#L227-L242
replies.author: Nashatyrev

timeline.body: Looks like these are being serialized - there's probably a flag to turn off this behavior
timeline.bodyText: Looks like these are being serialized - there's probably a flag to turn off this behavior
timeline.bodyHTML: Looks like these are being serialized - there's probably a flag to turn off this behavior
timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText:
Oh, thanks for pointing this 👍
Fix here: 1b023b8
Also excluded serialization of a null field
